requestBody.title: Create and publish offer version API Trace

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Recipient redemption flow". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Booking-time signature or pre-check-in signature". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.
